metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5165 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The C+ mode offload emulation in the RTL8139 network card device model in QEMU, as used in Xen 4.5.x and earlier, allows remote attackers to read process heap memory via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

qemu - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-common - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-guest-agent - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-keymaps - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-kvm - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-aarch64 - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-arm - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-common - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-mips - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-misc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-ppc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-sparc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-system-x86 - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-user - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-user-static - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
qemu-utils - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17
No subscription required

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.17').
xen package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2').
